column4: Hey all :) Could use some help with an ISO install, if anyone is willing
A description of the problem: CD in drive, boots into the install, allows me to select my location and language, and then does the "scanning CDrom" part and freezes on a blue screen
This seems similar to the behavior I got from a straight Debian install CD, which told me it couldn't read the image.
what kind of cd drive do u have?
